TopicTitle: Options to Toggle the Currencies On And Off

Articles.Content:
When looking at the three ostensibly different game modes, I realised something: they're all exactly the same game, just with one difference: they have different sets of currencies! Sandbox has none activated, Science has only science activated, and Career has all three activated.

Now, there's one problem with this: there's no point on them being different modes. The same thing could be achieved a lot better if when creating a new game, there were three checkboxes to toggle the three currencies.

This also opens up new gamemodes. Want a budget, but no research or reputation (like most career-oid rule systems on the forums)? You can! Want reputation, but no other currency? Of course! Hate capitalism, but still want to have reputation and research? You can do that! And, what's more, Squad wouldn't have to add an infinite* number of gamemodes to achieve this - just three checkboxes.

*actually 8

Summary: Remove the gamemodes, add toggling of currencies.
